subject: Acceptance of Performance Bank Guarantee
text: Hrty <eiy  <TTHNf wifaerut 7414 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (ev 4Rae7 3 <rTHTf +A1.4) Y57 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) -5 V 6, Vawr-10 _ ara1, T farit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/ Policy Guidelines/ Acceptance of Performance Bank Guarantee 2019 No.3.1.25/2019 dated the 04thSeptember , 2019 [Decision taken on File No.NHAI/Tech/KL/Kozhikode Bypass/Nh-17/2016-17 (pt.)] Sub: Acceptance of Performance Bank Guarantee As per the para 2 of the policy guidelines No. 3.1.23/2018 dated 10.09.2018 (Annex-A) "it is requested to strictly adhere to and implement the provisions of RFP , Concession Agreement/ Contract Agreement and accept the Bank Guarantee strictly on behalf of successful/ selected Bidder only" 2_ In case of projects being implemented on BOT  (Toll) and HAM; where the selected bidder incorporates a separate SPV company (Concessionaire) solely for the purpose of domiciling the project (as per Clause 9.1.1 of Concession Agreement), the Concessionaire' has to submit Performance Security in the form of Bank Guarantee. The aforesaid policy guidelines do not mention the word Concessionaire 3_ In many cases, due to stress in banking  sector, the successful bidder / Concessionaire submits the Bank Guarantee in the prescribed performa which is sourced from a third party (who is not the successful bidder/ Concessionaire) 4_ In order to streamline the procedure, the acceptability of the Bank Guarantee shall be taken as below: Scenario Action (a) The Bank Guarantee To be accepted (presently as per provisions of CA, only the issued on behalf of the SPV Concessionaire who can provide the BG) from facility sanctioned to the selected Bidder, in case of PPP projects (6) The Bank Guarantee To be accepted subject to furnishing of a letter from the issued on behalf of the SPV Third Party as mentioned in Annexure-1 and a letter from from facility sanctioned to a the Issuing Bank as mentioned in Annexure-2 to avoid legal third party for PPP Projects complication which arises at the time of invocation of Bank Guarantee by the Authority. (c) The Bank Guarantee To be accepted subject to furnishing of a letter from the issued on behalf of the EPC Third Party as mentioned in Annexure-1 and a letter from Contractor from facility the Issuing Bank as mentioned in Annexure-2 to avoid legal sanctioned to a third party in complication which arises at the time of invocation of Bank case Of a EPC project Guarantee by the Authority.
